name: Italy Puzzle – MPW
description:
Test our collection of free puzzle on one of the countries with the largest tourist attraction, due to the huge amount of monuments that has, in addition to the vast architecture, sculptures and works belonging to one of the most outstanding periods in the history of man, as was the renaissance that covered the XV and XVI centuries. This game helps exercise the ability to pattern recognition, creativity and imagination. The puzzles are divided into 3x3, 4x4 or 5x5 parts messy, you must place all the pieces of the puzzle in the correct position. The characteristics of our app are the following:

• 2 fun game modes
• 3 levels of difficulty
• Includes classification or world
• App for all ages

If you like the puzzles that show beautiful structures, in addition to stunning scenery and challenges, we have the app just for you. My Puzzle World Italy is one more version of My Puzzle World that account with a collection of parts and buildings based on the different styles of the different eras as: classicism, humanism, Roman architecture, the Gothic style, Renaissance style, the Quattrocento, Plateresque, Herrera style, the Cinquecento and mannerism among others. We must not fail to mention the great teachers who intervened in order to generate these monuments and give this great cultural wealth across all regions of Italy, some of them are: Leonardo da Vinci, Sandro Botticelli, El Greco, Tiziano Vecellio, Raffaello Sanzio, Miguel Angel, Jacopo Robusti, Paolo Caliari Veronese, Masaccio.

In the game mode by time, will give you a fragmented picture, which you must touch in its different parts to make them rotate and well suit up to be in the correct position. Between less time afternoons higher score of star and you'll get moving and unlocking the puzzle below.

In the game mode by score, you'll have access to all the puzzles, but before you start you'll need to choose the difficulty; a smaller number of parts, which will be divided the puzzle, to a larger number. Once you have chosen the difficulty, you have to move the different pieces of the puzzle for exchange of place and thus achieve suit up to resolve the image. Here the time is not the factor to overcome, the lower the number of movements you'll get higher score.

Below you will mention some of the things that you will find in the images of My Puzzle World Italy: monumental arches‎, commemorative and funerary architecture, monumental columns‎, fountains, monoliths‎, memorials‎, obelisks‎, monumental gates, religious monuments‎, watches monumental‎, tumuli, coliseums, mausoleums, walled cities, castles, towers of clock, streets, houses, rivers, ponds, national parks, mountains, lakes, cathedrals, headlights, towers, basilicas, squares, palaces, churches, pantheons, baths, villas, arenas, temples, theaters, gardens and many more.

You'll have the opportunity to feel like you are in beautiful Rome, walking a while by Milan, get to see a bit of Naples, a pinch of Turin, without forgetting Palermo and Genoa. Give a small look at Florence, and navigate through the quiet Venice, to admire the villages of Cinque Terre, know a little of Siena and the hills of Tuscany, the unforgettable Pisa and the Amalfi coast and since then the Vatican with their structures, and whirlwind tour through Sicily and Sorrento; you can't miss.
